p: Macroscopic and microscopic observations revealed that biomass grown in BB was more viable than cells cultured in STB ( Figure 1C,D). In the case of STB, during active growth, a faster browning of the growth medium and the presence of a suspension of broken cells accumulating in the vicinity of the bubbler was found. In the case of biomass incubated in BB, the medium did not turn brown during a 2-weeks growth cycle only showing slightly pearly opalescence ( Figure 1C,D).
